ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 3 |  | lt2addmuld.c | |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) |
| 4 |  | lt2addmuld.altc | |- ( ph -> A < C ) |

| 7 | 3 | #P_recnd | |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_2timesd | |- ( ph -> ( 2 x. C ) = ( C + C ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_breqtrrd | |- ( ph -> ( A + B ) < ( 2 x. C ) ) |
